song.title: Space Debris (2010 Reloaded)
song.info:
Space Debris 2010 Reloaded is XayberOptix's 64-bit rendition of a popular Amiga MOD (4-track audio file) titled "Space Debris" originally composed by Markus "Captain" Kaarlonen.
Music software used to make this soundtrack:
- Sony Acid Pro - reFX Nexus - reFX Vanguard - IK Multimedia SampleTank XL - IK Multimedia Sonik Synth - IK Multimedia Philharmonik
Video editing software:
- Sony Vegas Pro
The graphics animation seen in this video was borrowed from a movie called "Battle Space."
